Text: This torrent is real.  Is in zip format because there are many files on the folder.  The ebook is in pdf format. Thanks
This is the newly-released book on King Arthur by J. R. R. Tolkien.

Thanks for the fine post. I see the PDF is a conversion from the ebook. While it's very much appreciated, I would like to know if anyone has a true PDF of this title. Conversions always, despite the best of intentions, look like crap. The letter are huge, margins are non-existent, and the layout is just plain wrong.

@Darkrats
This Is The Only Version I Found On The Web.  Sorry, But I Dont Have A Better Version Of The Book...
